doc.after: Leonor Rivera is thought to be the inspiration for the character of Maria Clara in Noli Me TÃ¡ngere and El Filibusterismo.[23] Rivera and Rizal first met in Manila when Rivera was only 14 years old. When Rizal left for Europe on May 3, 1882, Rivera was 16 years of age. Their correspondence began when Rizal left a poem for Rivera saying farewell.[24]
